title: After playing LoL with my wife.
body:
I do think this sums it up.
https://i.imgur.com/RXBbUBN.gif[/img]

replies.body:
Wife & League of legends?
What sorcery is this?{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
https://media.giphy.com/media/ZAdAS1xI8Ormg/giphy.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Demon King Maou,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=lvG2k0AQ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-05-19T23:49:40.139+0000)
>
> Wife & League of legends?
> What sorcery is this?{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

you get the wife BEFORE you play league. that's how divorces happen.
I actually met my current girlfriend through League. Happy for 2 years and counting so far.
Been playing with my wife since 2015, she was my girlfriend at first and we bonded over bot lane amongst real life as well.
Good to hear that gaming brings people even closer. Hope you have a good life.
This is super cute.
https://media.giphy.com/media/9rZaXswTGDmBG/giphy.gif
Gotta appreciate that she's trying.
https://media.giphy.com/media/ap6wcjRyi8HoA/giphy.gif
What's a wife?
and then they both left the game{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

This is cute..
Divorce her for ELO though
Got a smirk out of this

people don’t get dry humor.
-sigh-

its true they don't 
https://thumbs.gfycat.com/TiredFancyHummingbird-max-1mb.gif

*forever alone intensifies*
http://i.memeful.com/media/post/VMVnXM2_700wa_0.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Trias000,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=lvG2k0AQ,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2018-05-20T19:39:21.390+0000)
>
> *forever alone intensifies*
> http://i.memeful.com/media/post/VMVnXM2_700wa_0.gif

You need MGTOW in your life bro. Lonelyness becomes solitude and peace. You start to care about whats best for you and ignore society. Suddenly you have way more time and money to do with as you please and suddenly women notice you for what you could do for them. Then you ignore them.

Jesus, MGTOW sounds like a way of life thats literally common sense. Anyone is more attractive when theyre happy and secure. You dont need to join a group to be taught this. I get its a source of pain for a lot of people because they overvalue relationships way too early in life but holy shit its just common sense.
Ignoring them when they want you is just mean lol. Why do to someone else what has been seemingly done to you. Women ignore desperation because desperation is ugly.

> [{quoted}](name=Mig89,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=lvG2k0AQ,comment-id=000f00000000,timestamp=2018-05-25T20:05:18.930+0000)
>
> Jesus, MGTOW sounds like a way of life thats literally common sense. Anyone is more attractive when theyre happy and secure. You dont need to join a group to be taught this. I get its a source of pain for a lot of people because they overvalue relationships way too early in life but holy shit its just common sense.
> Ignoring them when they want you is just mean lol. Why do to someone else what has been seemingly done to you. Women ignore desperation because desperation is ugly.

You don't ignore them because it was done to you. You ignore them because you no longer need to become disposable utility. When you are aware of gynocentrism, it becomes  easy to do.  Your entire life, time, money, and resources continues to be completely yours to do as you see fit. You dont need to buy a ten thousand dollar rock to prove your worth or cancel plans for the "Honey Do" this. You can play league when you want without an upset partner pulling the plug because you are not focused entirely on her wants.

Added benfits: No divorce rape, child support, cheating, or false accusations. Those things can leave you suicidal. Sure people will tell you to man up, but you wont care because your life is awesome and theirs sucks.
Cute. Will ask my wife to do that, hope she doesn't hit her head
I came here to give condolences over your impending divorce, but then i saw you're probably not duoing ranked >.>
I tell my girlfriend im having a bad game and she tells me to take care of the baby for an hour instead of being bad at a video game lol. (she says it jokingly, shes not a serious)(I hope)
She still does more carrying than most of my allies in my ranked games.
Upvote this to oblivion
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
{{champion:157}} yasuo carries the mach and carries both

yasuo is their adopted unwanted son
{{summoner:1}} onces u cleanse and u are not stunned {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
do you main Wukong and your wife main Ahri?

Yes i do main Wukong but i also enjoy Mord and Darius  and even Udyr.

She plays Lux mostly but a little bit of Ahri and annie and even Riven... (i swear she plays riven to tilt me lol)
Aww how cute...haha...too bad i'm lonely and depressed and would quit League if it gave me a respectable status among women. #BeautyInDeath

aww
